StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm thinking about investigating the ruins
by <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>.

Have you been? It's a unique little
town that had lots of <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>
land nearby.
<snd:Chat_01>I heard a local building company is
partnering with the survey team to <clr:0000>study<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>potential uses <clr:ffff>for all those <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.
If I could get involved in that...that'd just
be SO cool!

You should go too. It's in Akkala. You can
get there by going <clr:0000>east <clr:ffff>on the road.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Really—I hope I haven't made it sound
like it's only for researchers. It's a
super-fun town!
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The <clr:0000>sludge<clr:ffff> that falls from the sky can be
<clr:0000>washed away with water<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It seems the sky is dropping all sorts of
things.<sp:5:0:0> I wonder what else is up there...
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Hello again! <sp:5:0:0>Thanks for helping out with
those underdressed scientists.

I can't believe they misheard "explore all
other paths" as "explore in underpants."<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Hee-hee... I know that's not funny, but
it's really funny.

Anyway, I'm just glad I don't have to work
in my underpants.

And it's because you opened everyone's
eyes to the...<sp:5:0:0>naked truth. <sp:5:0:0>Hee-hee!
FriendGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Oh! Hello again.


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Hee-hee... I keep thinking about how
everyone looked in their underpants.

They really misunderstood the brief.
Or should I say...<sp:5:0:0>briefs. <sp:5:0:0>Hee-hee!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm thinking about investigating the ruins
by <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>.

Have you been? It's in Akkala—<sp:5:0:0>just follow
the road <clr:0000>east <clr:ffff>and you'll get there.

Lots of <clr:0000>Zonai devices <clr:ffff>landed near it,
so it's worth checking out.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_00>I heard a local building company is
partnering with the survey team to <clr:0000>study<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>potential uses <clr:ffff>for all those <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.
And getting involved in that... It'd be like
a dream come true!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Whew,<sp:5:0:0> I'm just so glad to be out here
investigating again.

And if you didn't sort out that underpants
thing, it never would've happened.
So...thanks!
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I really don't like rain. <sp:5:1:0>It keeps me from
investigating ruins.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Although...<sp:5:0:0> Do you think that the rain ever
brings ruins down with it?
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>I hear there's a vast, sprawling cavern
beneath that <clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>nearby.

They've found all sorts of things at the
bottom, even <clr:0000>statues<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Which means that at some point, people
may have been living down there!

When I'm done with my work on the
surface, I have to go explore that chasm!
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Did you hear about Lanayru? I hear folks
there are struggling with <clr:0000>sludge <clr:ffff>falling
from the sky.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's some kind of sticky, black muck.
Luckily, <clr:0000>water can wash it away<clr:ffff>.

<snd:Chat_00>It seems all sorts of things fall from the
sky.<sp:5:0:0> I wonder what else is up there...
SavedLv2_00: <sp:3:0:2:0800>You saved me! Thank you! Oh, thank you!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Lots of <clr:0000>Zonai devices <clr:ffff>landed around the
village, so it's worth checking out.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_00>I heard a local building company is
partnering with the survey team to <clr:0000>study<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>potential uses <clr:ffff>for all those <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.
And getting involved in that... It'd be like
a dream come true!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>But...it looks like the only way to reach it
is by <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff>.

And I'm...<sp:5:0:0>I'm not so good with heights.


<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I wonder if I could get there from the
other direction...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>There's a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> near here. <sp:5:0:0>You'll never
guess what the Zonai Survey Team found
at the bottom...
A vast, sprawling cavern!


I hear they even found some ruins
and <clr:0000>statues<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know what that means. <sp:5:0:0>At some
point, there may have been people living
down there!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Hee-hee... <sp:5:0:0>When I'm done with my work
on the surface, I'd love to go and explore
that chasm!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease>If it weren't for you, I'd be a goner!
Thank you!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Tarrey Town <clr:ffff>is a unique little village that
had lots of <clr:0000>Zonai devices <clr:ffff>land nearby.

I heard a local building company is
partnering with the survey team to <clr:0000>study<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>potential uses <clr:ffff>for all those <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But...it looks like the only way to reach it
is by <clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff>.

<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>And that's just too high up for me...<sp:5:1:0> Should I try

RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you think that rain ever brings ruins
down with it?<sp:5:0:0>
GoRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Plants we've never seen before<clr:ffff> are
attached to the ruins falling from the sky.

It's almost as if the sky has its own
ecosystem. <sp:5:0:0>Wouldn't that be something...

I'm thinking about heading over to
<clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>, since so many ruins fell
around there.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Who knows what strange new things
I might see?
Near_GoalPoint_01: I can't wait to see the site.
Failed00: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sigh>Ah! How did we make it out of that?!
Atacked01: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Waaah! Stay away! I'm, um, warning you!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sigh>I don't want to go through anything like
that ever again!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>This is the best I can do to thank you—
please take it!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Plants we've never seen before<clr:ffff> are

It's almost as if the sky has its own
